summary: Enhanced jumping ability to simulate flying.
descriptionHtml:
Name:  Vampire Jumping Ability
Version:  1.0
Date:  Feb 24, 2012
Author:  entropiachrome


* * Please click the VIDEO TAB for a YouTube video which features this mod. * * 


When I created a vampire character, I had visions of vampires that were able to fly... or at least remain somewhat airborne when jumping.  This .esp modification allows superhuman jumping ability (about as high as the roof of an average home) and completely eliminates fall damage.

This mod can be checked or unchecked in the “Data Files” section of the Skyrim loading screen.  This allows you to activate the mod only for characters you want to have the jumping ability.  (This mod may also work well for werewolves)

The settings used for this mod can be changed in the console command (~) and adjusted to different settings if you so choose:

Vampire Jumping Ability
fJumpHeightMin 666
fJumpFallVelocityMin 666
fJumpFallHeightExponent 0
fJumpFallHeightMult 0
fJumpFallHeightMin 6666


===========
INSTALLATION:
Download with Nexus Mod Manager, or place the .esp file in your Skyrim Data folder.
===========


===========
UNINSTALL:
Remove with Nexus Mod Manager, or delete the .esp file from your Skyrim Data folder.

If needed, here are the console command (~) vanilla settings:

Vanilla 
fJumpHeightMin 76
fJumpFallVelocityMin 700
fJumpFallHeightExponent 1.45
fJumpFallHeightMult .1
fJumpFallHeightMin 600
===========


===========
BUGS:
None, although jumping inside will cause you to hit the ceiling... a small inconvenience to pay for the price of flight outdoors!
===========


==========
CREDITS:
Thank you to MofoMojo for helping me with this mod on the Nexus Forums – Skyrim Mod Talk

Bethesda for creating TES V: Skyrim and the Creation Kit
===========
author: entropiachrome
